full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Purchase of Growth Chambers

The Harrow Research and Development Centre of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is inviting bids for the purchase of four (4) growth chambers. This procurement is restricted to holders of the Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI.

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: O1B46-23-012
* **Publication Date**: 2023-04-20
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2023-05-30T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-05-08
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-01-31

### Scope of Work

The purchased growth chambers will be used at the Harrow Research and Development Centre for laboratory and scientific purposes.

### Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price, with a comprehensive and progressive agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) being one of the applicable trade agreements.

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification, please contact:
Jacques Toussaint
(jacques.toussaint@agr.gc.ca, 438 455 8237)

### Document Attachments and Additional Information

The tender notice and all related documents are available at the following URL:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4940/npp-apm---e60pv-19equi.pdf.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Delivery Region

The growth chambers will be delivered to Essex, Ontario (except NCR).

### Procurement Category

This is a General Department (GD) procurement. The contract value is not disclosed.
